Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.effect

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CanPositioningEverywhereLeader
    Class to create the Can Position everywhere effect
    CardBan
    Class that represent the Card ban effect At the end of the match, delete the corresponding cards in the player list
    CardCostBan
    At the end of the match, the gamelogic calculate the cost of woods and stones of the indicated cards and remove victory points from the player resources
    CardForEachObtain
    Class that represent the Card For Each Obtain effect.
    CouncilObtain
    Create a request for the gamelogic to obtain the resources from the council privileges
    DoAction
    Allow player to do another action This creates an ActionPrototype, that will be consumed by the GameLogic
    Effect
    This is the abstract class for all the game effects, such as Immediate, Permanent and Ban effect With this class was implemented the Strategy Pattern
    FiveMoreVictoryPointLeader
    Class that represents the leader effect which give to the user five more victory points every time he pays his faith point
    ForEachObtain
    Class that represents the For Each obtain, in other words, when this effect is activated, the player obtain something for each requirements he has among his resources
    IncreaseAction
    Create a particular effect that increments the level of an action.
    IncreaseFamiliarsPoint
    Class that represents the increase familiars point effect.
    IncreaseSingleFamiliar
    Simple method used to increment only one familiar
    NoBonusInTower
    This method set a player variable to disable the Tower Bonus
    NoFirstActionBan
    Set a player variable, then the GameLogic knows the player cannot play the first action
    NoMarketBan  
    NoMilitaryRequirementsLeader  
    NoMoneyMalusLeader  
    Obtain
    Obtain the indicated resources by paying the following costs
    ObtainBan
    ObtainBan Class.
    SetAllFamiliarsLeader
    Class that represents the leader effect that set all familiars values, e.g. the "Ludovico il Moro" effect.
    SetSingleFamiliarLeader
    Effect used in leader cards to set one familiar value
    SlaveBan
    A player need more slaves to increase his familiars.
